name: Quest of Life - Prototype Demo
description:
Due to this project being made for a gamejam, the final product will not necessarily be indicative of the current demo's product. Feedback is welcome.

Once upon a time, in a planet codenamed R, two beings were manifested into this world.

-----

One was a beacon of life that maintains the balance of all things living.

The other, was the embodiment of death and destruction, able to end fragile mortals with a single tip of the touch.

-----

They prove to be far too strong and they can grow their powers to absolute extremes.

This cannot continue. 

We must put an end to this once and for all. 

Because the world is not for them to take.
